page.title: 10FETES
page.content: Each August Bank Holiday Monday a Fete is held in Methwold on the Recreation ground. Floats are decorated by various organisations in the village and are paraded through the streets before the fete is officially opened by a well-known personality. Each year the fete has a special theme, in 1984 it was "The 40th Anniversary of Methwold Airfield" and in 1985 it was "The international year of youth." There is a fancy dress competition, races and a great variety of sideshows. There is entertainment in the centre ring throughout the afternoon,i.e.B.M.X.bike display, First Aid,Country dancing,marching bands, radio-controlled aircraft and sheep-dog displays.
